metadata.name: Restraining Order
metadata.description:
• Passive • +3 coins, +3 bombs, +3 keys, +3 soul hearts, and +32.5% Angel room chance • You can no longer enter Devil rooms • Repentance and multiplayer support
You can now destroy the statue that appears in Devil rooms, and doing so will spawn a Restraining Order in its place. The Restraining Order is an incentive to avoid Devil deals; it gives great rewards, but "bans" you from Devil rooms for the rest of the run. In other words, entering a Devil room immediately teleports you back to the previous room. The Restraining Order won't spawn - and will even despawn - if you take a Devil deal.
You can also use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]Mod Config Menu[/url] to change the number of coins/bombs/keys/soul hearts spawned by this item.
[u]Item Pools[/u] • None (destroy the statue in a Devil room to spawn it)
